TaskDescription.Detail: It receives a message from the user, stores it in a variable, and outputs the message stored in the variable.

Assist.value: This activity stores the value a user entered as text in a variable. Check the variable(var1) created in advance in the variable window.
Double-click the property field and select this.var1.
This activity prints a specified variable in a message box.
Double-click the property field and select this.var1.
This activity stores the value a user entered as OK or Cancel in a variable. Check the variable(var2) created in advance in the variable window.
Double-click the property field and select this.var2.
This activity prints a specified variable in a message box.
Double-click the property field and select this.var2.
This activity stores the value a user entered as Abort, Retry or Ignore in a variable. Check the variable(var3) created in advance in the variable window.
Double-click the property field and select this.var3.
This activity prints a specified variable in a message box.
Double-click the property field and select this.var3.
